trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There were no other sightings in Las Vegas on or around September 24th 2010
divs: Sighting Detailsat first thought it was a firework but it did not dim,explode or drop towards the ground, i was sb on durango moving btwn 45 and 50 mph, it never swereved or moved from side to side but could not distinguish anything inside the light it was so bright, whne i held my thumb up it was bigger then my thumb and not very high in the sky. kept waiting for it to blink or flash as i was thinking maybe a helicopter but the light was quite steady. i realized is was moving to the south faster then i was as it was slowly going down towars my horizon which was starting to be cluttered with buildings and trees. by the time i got to an area with a good line of sight of most of the valley it was gone
Summary: very brught bright red light just appeared in the sky as seen thru my drivers side window
